client_id.title: ClientID
client_id.description: Your Plaid API `client_id`. The `client_id` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-CLIENT-ID` header or as part of a request body.

secret.title: APISecret
secret.description: Your Plaid API `secret`. The `secret` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-SECRET` header or as part of a request body.

applications.description: A list of loan applications to register.

user_token.description: The user token for the user associated with the loan.

application_id.description:
A unique identifier for the loan application.
Personally identifiable information, such as an email address or phone number, should not be used in the `application_id`.

type.description: The type of loan the user applied for.

decision.description: The decision of the loan application.

application_date.description: The date the user applied for the loan. The date should be in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD).

decision_date.description: The date when the loan application's decision was made. The date should be in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD).
